name: Letterpress Greeting : You Deserve Cake
description:
Say "thank you!" or "congratulations!" or "happy birthday!" with this fabulous and luxurious 1950s-inspired letterpress greeting.

Perfect for any occasion that could conceivably involve cake (the possibilities are endless!)

An original illustration, printed on a huge 108-year-old Chandler & Price letterpress using magnesium plates and hand-mixed ink. 

The card is packaged in a crystal-clear resealable sleeve with a pink envelope. Blank inside, for your message. 

Safely shipped in a hard cardboard mailer.

The distinctive thick stock I use is made from 100% reclaimed cotton, so materials once destined for the landfills are instead used to create this card.

Card measurements: 5.5in x 4.25in when folded

{all images and artwork copyright sweet olive press, all rights reserved}
